availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
Kentucky Cumberland County Court at
September Term 1861
The following order was made to wit

It appearing to the court that Wm H Speer who was elected at the august Election 1861 to fill the office of justice in this county in District No 4 in the room and stead of C C Hughs deceased since said Election, Said Spear has departed this life, It is ordered that Charles Smith be recomended to the Governor as a suitable person to fill the vacancy occasioned by the death of Wm H Spear, It is further ordered that this order be copied and certified

A copy
att N. B. Cheatham clk

Speer was Elected in the place of C C Hughs
N. B. C
